message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "This study utilized the data from the World Bank's Enterprise Survey and the Doing Business report to examine the relationship between business regulations and firm performance in Eastern Europe and Central Asia.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Enterprise Survey", "Doing Business report"], "topic": ["Competitiveness", "Governance"]}, {"sentence": "We analyzed a dataset of over 10,000 households in South Asia from the Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS) program to investigate the impact of cooking fuel choice on indoor air pollution.", "dataset": ["Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS)"], "topic": ["Health", "Environment"]}, {"sentence": "The research relied on a variety of data sources including the World Bank's Logistics Performance Index (LPI), the International Transport Forum's Road Freight Transport Performance Indicators, and the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development's (UNCTAD) liner shipping connectivity index.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Logistics Performance Index (LPI)", "International Transport Forum's Road Freight Transport Performance Indicators", "United Nations Conference on Trade and Development's (UNCTAD) liner shipping connectivity index"], "topic": ["Transport", "Trade"]}, {"sentence": "Using a panel dataset of manufacturing firms in India with information on their export status, financial health and sustainability practices, we examine how export participation affects the adoption of environmental management practices.", "dataset": ["panel dataset of manufacturing firms in India"], "topic": ["Environmental Sustainability", "Trade"]}, {"sentence": "In this paper, we use data from the Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) and the World Food Program's (WFP) Comprehensive Food Security and Vulnerability Analysis (CFSVA) surveys to explore the impact of conflict on food security in Yemen.", "dataset": ["Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX)", "World Food Program's (WFP) Comprehensive Food Security and Vulnerability Analysis (CFSVA)"], "topic": ["Fragility, Conflict, and Violence", "Food Security"]}, {"sentence": "We analyze a unique dataset of over 200,000 firms across 145 countries collected by the World Bank's Enterprise Surveys on the adoption of digital technologies by manufacturing firms around the world.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Enterprise Surveys"], "topic": ["Digital Development", "Competitiveness"]}, {"sentence": "We use a dataset constructed from official records of China's Aid to Africa, which covers more than 7,000 projects in 50 African countries from 2000 to 2017, to explore the relationship between foreign aid effectiveness and governance quality in Africa.", "dataset": ["official records of China's Aid to Africa"], "topic": ["Governance", "Foreign Aid"]}, {"sentence": "This study uses data from the Global Financial Inclusion (Global Findex) database to examine the factors that influence mobile money adoption in low- and middle-income countries.", "dataset": ["Global Financial Inclusion (Global Findex) database"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion", "Mobile Technology"]}, {"sentence": "To study the impact of natural disasters on labor market outcomes, we used a combination of individual-level survey data from the Understanding Risk (UR) Global Facility and remotely-sensed disaster event data from the Global Inundation Flood Extent Dataset (GIFED).", "dataset": ["Understanding Risk (UR) Global Facility", "Global Inundation Flood Extent Dataset (GIFED)"], "topic": ["Disaster Risk Management", "Jobs & Development"]}, {"sentence": "Using data from the Worldwide Governance Indicators (WGI), Women Business and the Law dataset, and the Gender, Institutions and Development Database (GID-DB), this paper explores the relationship between gender equality, governance quality and economic growth.", "dataset": ["Worldwide Governance Indicators (WGI)", "Women Business and the Law dataset", "Gender, Institutions and Development Database (GID-DB)"], "topic": ["Governance", "Gender", "Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]} ]
